intro: This Product User Manual provides comprehensive technical guidance for service providers involved in the Copernicus Urban Atlas program. It details the methodology for creating standardised land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps, with a specific focus on updates for the 2012 and 2018 reference years. The manual covers the mapping of Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) across Europe, addressing product attributes, nomenclature, quality control, and the integration of Earth Observation (EO) data with ancillary datasets to ensure consistent and comparable results.
